sentence.Network_en: "He made you do it?" Her voice was incredulous.
sentence.Network_cn: “他强迫你做的？”她的语气里带着怀疑。

sentence.Network_en: There was a brief, incredulous silence.
sentence.Network_cn: 有一段短暂的充满怀疑的沉默。

sentence.Network_en: I am wholly incredulous of the truth of his story.
sentence.Network_cn: 我根本不相信他说的是真话.

incredulity 怀疑incredulous 不轻信的incremate 火葬

高级英语词汇区别总结 - 英语巴士 ... Withhold: 意为“抵制”，“拒绝给予” Incredulous: 表示怀疑的 Embitter: 使苦恼，怨恨，使痛苦.

list.abs: the story Bill told us was incredible and so we were incredulous about it .比尔给我们讲的那个故事令人难以置信，因此我们心存怀疑。
I am wholly incredulous of the truth of his story .我根本不相信他说的是真话。
four pairs of incredulous eyes looked at me as I pro ceeded to open the refrigerator .四双惊讶的眼睛看着我打开了冰箱。
He asked me with an incredulous look ., 他用怀疑的神情问我.

derivation.yuyuan_name: 16th cent.: from Latin incredulus (from in- 'not' + credulus 'believing, trusting', from credere 'believe') + -ous

entry.tran: 不相信的;不轻信的;怀疑的
entry.def: If someone is incredulous, they are unable to believe something because it is very surprising or shocking.

example.ex: 'He made you do it?' Her voice was incredulous...
example.tran: “他强迫你做的？”她的语气里带着怀疑。

example.ex: There was a brief, incredulous silence.
example.tran: 有一段短暂的充满怀疑的沉默。

means.word_mean: 1. not disposed or willing to believe; unbelieving

auth_sentence.content: The New York apartment dweller in me is incredulous.
auth_sentence.res_content: The New York apartment dweller in me is incredulous.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The New York apartment dweller in me is incredulous.

auth_sentence.content: Today, Benson is as incredulous as I am.
auth_sentence.res_content: Today, Benson is as incredulous as I am.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Today, Benson is as incredulous as I am.

auth_sentence.content: For a moment, the expert looked quite incredulous.
auth_sentence.res_content: For a moment, the expert looked quite incredulous.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: For a moment, the expert looked quite incredulous.

stems_affixes.word_buile: cred相信+ible能……的→adj.可靠的,可信的
cred相信,信任+ulous多……的→相信太多→轻信的
in不+credulous[adj.轻信的,易信的]→adj.怀疑的, 不轻信的
cred相信,信任+it表抽象名词→ n.&v.信任;贷款;n.学分
cred相信,信任+ential表形容词或名词→让人相信的东西→凭据
credulous[[adj.轻信的,易信的]]→n.易信, 轻信
cred相信,信任+it表抽象名词→ n.&v.信任;贷款;n.学分
ac给予+credit[ n.&v.信任;贷款;n.学分]→给予相信→委托
dis不+credit[ n.&v.信任;贷款;n.学分]→v.不信任,怀疑

means.word_mean: 表示怀疑的, 不相信的

sentences.en: She gave me an incredulous glance.
sentences.cn: 她表示怀疑地向我瞥了一眼。

sentences.en: I am wholly incredulous of the truth of his story.
sentences.cn: 我根本不相信他说的是真话。
